title: Inferno Tree
desc:
Post 672
- Can also be played on any <:sprout:1118917438893985802> card, even if it is not your turn
- When played, player who played the <:sprout:1118917438893985802> this was placed on top of will draw a random <:black:1106265022453268530> card
- If no <:sprout:1118917438893985802> is under this when player, you gain +2 money and draw a <:sprout:1118917438893985802> card
